content: just a leaf by hinke one day i needed an ornament for a gift wrap and knitted a leaf for it inspired by julie weisenberg s beautiful knitted wreath http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/knitted-wreath/ or http //www cocoknits com/knit/interiors/knittedwreath html this leaf is knitted in the round on 3 needles and the stem is made in i-cord you might as well use it as a christmas tree ornament with a longer i-cord and a second leaf added to the other side it makes a lovely cord to wrap around a gift or add it to the top of a hat i imagine it even make as a branch existing out of a long i-cord with leaves sprouting out on numerous sides pattern notes gauge yarn and needles gauge is not crucial just choose your needles to match your yarn the way you want it bigger yarn/needles gives a bigger leave thin yarn with big needles gives an airy leaf etcetera in any case you ll need 3 dpn s in the size of your choice stitches k knit p purl yo yarn over ssk slip slip knit k2tog knit 2 together i-cord see http //www stitchdiva com/custom aspx id=196 cable cast on see http //www knittingonthenet com/learn/cablecaston htm directions stem the stem is made in i-cord see stitches as follows cast on 3 stitches on one of the dpn s and make an i-cord as long as you want it to be when you re at the last row add 3 extra stitches by using the cable cast on method see stitches you ll have 6 sts now divide these 6 sts on 2 needles 3 sts on each one leaf the leaf is knitted in the round sitting on the 2 needles this may be a little tricky at first but it works round 1 on the first needle k1 yo k1 yo k1 - repeat this for second needle 5 sts on each needle round 2 knit all stitches round 3 k2 yo k1 yo k2 on first needle repeat this for 2nd needle 7 sts on each needle round 4 knit all sts round 5 k3 yo k1 yo k3 repeat for 2nd needle 9 sts on each needle round 6-9 knit all sts round 10 ssk k5 k2tog both needles 7 sts on each needle round 11 knit all sts round 12 *ssk k3 k2tog* on both needles 5 sts on each needle round 13 knit all sts round 14 ssk k1 k2tog 3 sts on each needle round 15 knit all sts round 16 slip 2 sts together knit-wise k1 pass 2 slipped sts over repeat for 2nd needle break off yarn and pull through remaining 2 stitches weave in ends to the inside of the leaf and stem there s your leaf
